pages.text: The $(d)Peace Candle$() prevents hostile mobs from spawning in a radius around it. By default, this radius a single chunk (so a 3x3 chunk area).$(br2)It can be disabled with a Redstone signal.
pages.title: Peace Candle

pages.text: Peace Candles can be found in certain Village temples. Where there would be a Brewing Stand, instead you may sometimes find a Peace Candle.
